container.heading: State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Alcoholism and Drug Abuse Intermediate Care Facility Treatment Services

para.text: In this chapter, the following documents are incorporated by reference.
The State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Alcoholism and Drug Abuse Intermediate Care Facility Treatment Services.

annotations.annotation: Health-General Article, §§19-109(a)(1) and 19-121, Annotated Code of Maryland

Regulation .01 adopted as an emergency provision effective March 8, 1990 (17:7 Md. R. 843); emergency status extended at 17:22 Md. R. 2653 and 18:6 Md. R. 681; adopted permanently effective September 2, 1991 (18:17 Md. R. 1918)
Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective March 12, 1992 (19:7 Md. R. 742); amended permanently effective August 3, 1992 (19:15 Md. R. 1390)
Regulation .01 amended effective January 21, 2002 (29:1 Md. R. 23); February 18, 2013 (40:3 Md. R. 218)
Regulation .01C amended effective January 8, 2001 (27:26 Md. R. 2358)
